owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: commented By
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a comment or reply action to the user account that authored it. This is functional as a specific comment action is performed by one primary user.
Menghubungkan aksi komentar atau balasan dengan akun pengguna yang membuatnya. Properti ini functional karena sebuah aksi komentar spesifik dilakukan oleh satu pengguna utama.

owl:ObjectProperty.MCSScomment: Links a comment with the User who made the comment.

owl:ObjectProperty.MPcomment: Points to the user who wrote this comment.

owl:ObjectProperty.OSNcomment: Links a comment with the User who made the comment.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: comments On
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a comment or reply action to the specific content it is commenting on. This is functional as a specific comment action targets one piece of content.
Menghubungkan aksi komentar atau balasan dengan konten spesifik yang dikomentari. Properti ini functional karena sebuah aksi komentar spesifik menargetkan satu konten.
Specialization for comments on MCSS posts.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: liked Content
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a liking reaction action to the content that was liked. The reflexivity depends on whether the subject is the user performing the action or the action itself. Not explicitly set to allow users liking their own content via a reaction action.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: disliked Content
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a disliking reaction action to the content that was disliked. Not explicitly set as irreflexive to allow users disliking their own content via a reaction action.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: shared Content
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a sharing action to the content that was shared. The sharing action itself is irreflexive.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: reported Content
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a reporting action to the content that was reported. The reporting action itself is irreflexive.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: attributed to User
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates an entity (e.g., content, channel, post) to the user account it is primarily associated with or owned by. Often functional, as content typically has one primary author/owner.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: blocks User
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to another user account that it blocks. This is asymmetric (if A blocks B, B does not necessarily block A) and irreflexive (a user does not block themselves).

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: unblocks User
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to another user account that it unblocks. Irreflexive.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: locks Content
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a moderator or user to a piece of content (e.g., post) that they lock. The actor (user/moderator) does not lock itself via this property.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: follows
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A general property indicating a following relationship. It's typically asymmetric (A follows B doesn't mean B follows A) and irreflexive (a user does not follow themselves).

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: unfollows
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Represents the action of unfollowing an entity. Irreflexive.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: reports
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A general property indicating a reporting action where a user reports another user. Use sub-properties for specific targets. Typically irreflexive (user does not report themselves).

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: reports Content
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A user reports a piece of content.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: reports Account
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A user reports another user account.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: reports Message
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A user reports a message.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: reports Channel
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A user reports a channel.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: sends Message To
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user (sender) to another user (receiver) of a message. Typically irreflexive in a direct person-to-person messaging context.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: searches For
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user to the entity or concept they are searching for.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: saves Search
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user to a search query or search functionality that they save.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: can Edit Profile Setting
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates that a user has permission to edit a profile setting. This describes a capability.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: can Set Visibility
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates that a user can set the visibility of their profile or content. This describes a capability.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: edits Avatar
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user to an avatar they edit.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: likes Comment
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a liking reaction action to the comment that was liked.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: joins Community
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to a group or community they join. Irreflexive (a user joins a community, not itself as the community).

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: pins Item
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A general property for pinning an item. Typically irreflexive (the pinner is distinct from the pinned item). Use sub-properties for specific actor/target.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: leaves Group Chat
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to a group chat they leave. Irreflexive.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: mutes Group Chat
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to a group chat they mute. Irreflexive.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: creates Group Chat
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to a group chat they create. Irreflexive.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: subscribes To
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to an entity they subscribe to (e.g., creator, plan, service). Asymmetric and irreflexive.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: schedules Post
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to a post they schedule for future publication.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: edits Scheduled Post
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to a scheduled post they edit.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: publishes Scheduled Post
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account (or system) to a scheduled post that gets published.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: posted By
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifically relates a Post or Story to the UserAccount that authored it. Functional.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: enables Notifications For
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to an entity (e.g., group message, user) for which they enable notifications.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: views Message
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to a message they view.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: views Message Analytics
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to message analytics data they view.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: MCSS belongs to Live
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a donation or superchat to the live event it belongs to. A specific superchat belongs to one live event.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: OSN profile belongs to User
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates an OSN User Profile to the OSN User account it belongs to. Functional and InverseFunctional if a profile is uniquely tied to one user, and a user has one primary profile concept of this type.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: interacts With Shop
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to a shop or marketplace feature they interact with.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: interacts With Video
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to a video content they interact with.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: approves Post
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a moderator or admin to a post they approve.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: denies Post
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a moderator or admin to a post they deny or reject.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: joins Group Chat
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to a group chat they join. Irreflexive.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: created By Moderator
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates an entity (e.g., a rule) to the moderator who created it. Functional.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: reacted By
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a reaction action to the user account that performed the reaction. Functional.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: deletes Message
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to a message they delete.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: replies To Message
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a message (reply) to the message it is replying to. Irreflexive (a message doesn't reply to itself).

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: sends Voice Note To
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user (sender) to another user (receiver) of a voice note. Irreflexive.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: replies To Comment
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a comment (reply action) to the comment action it is replying to. Irreflexive.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: user Shares Community
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to a community they share.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: content Shared To Community
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a piece of content to a community it is shared to.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: saves Draft
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to a draft content they save.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: message Receiver
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a message to its intended recipient user account. Functional in direct messaging contexts.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: receives Message From
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Inverse of messageReceiver. Relates a user account to a message they receive from another user.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: user Shares Content
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A direct relationship between a user and the content they share.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Participant
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a group chat or group to a user account that is a participant.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: edits Recommendation Preferences
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to recommendation preferences they edit.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: receives Recommendation
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to content or an entity that is recommended to them.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: unsubscribes From
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a user account to an entity (e.g., creator, plan, service) they unsubscribe from. Irreflexive.
